about_the_game:
Meowventures - Inside The Mirror Realm is an isometric 3D puzzle adventure where you follow a mischievous kitty that, after accidentally breaking a valuable vase, discovers a portal in a nearby mirror.

The vase fragments are pulled into the mirror, leading you to a realm filled with challenges and mysteries. Guiding your curious feline, you’ll explore various worlds to find the lost pieces, solving clever puzzles along the way while racing against time. Will your kitty manage to restore the vase before you return home?

Features:

  • Charming Isometric 3D Puzzles: Engage in visually captivating, brain-teasing puzzles across various mirror worlds.

  • Unique Mirror-Travel Mechanic: Navigate different dimensions through magical mirrors to recover the vase fragments.

  • Adorable Feline Protagonist: Play as a curious and brave kitty on a mission to restore a broken vase.

  • Varied Puzzle Environments: Explore beautifully designed, diverse worlds, each offering its own challenges and surprises.

  • Time-based Challenge: Solve puzzles and recover the fragments before the owner returns home.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit) / Windows 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4440 / AMD FX 6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 TI 4GB / AMD RX 570 4GB / Arc Graphics (H-iGPU)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These Requirements are for 1080p at Low Quality - 60 FPS.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit) / Windows 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 | AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 8GB / AMD RX 580 8GB / ARC A380 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These Requirements are for 1080p at Ultra Quality - 60 FPS.
